episodes.title: Is There a Creator?
episodes.plot: This program examines some recent scientific theories of the universe and conceptions about God they may suggest.

episodes.title: The Riddle of Black Holes
episodes.plot: After reviewing theories about how black holes form and how they were detected this program looks at their counterintuitive behavior that makes them seem so bizarre.

episodes.title: Is Time Travel Possible?
episodes.plot: But if we succeed with time travel, what are the consequences of such freedom? Will we get trapped in a plethora of paradoxes and multiple universes that will destroy the fabric of the universe?

episodes.title: What Happened Before the Beginning?
episodes.plot: Following a review of the discovery and evidence for the Big Bang this program examines the progress of scientists trying to determine what went on before the Big Bang that could have caused it.

episodes.title: How Did We Get Here?
episodes.plot: Scientists explore a variety of ways that life may have formed on earth and try to recreate them.

episodes.title: Are We Alone?
episodes.plot: This program considers the likelihood that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe and the prospects that it may inhabit a nearby planet. Then the various methods being used to look for alien intelligence are reviewed.

episodes.title: What Are We Really Made Of?
episodes.plot: This program delves deep into the atom to find the ultimate constituents of matter focusing finally on the theoretical Higgs Boson.

episodes.title: Beyond the Darkness
episodes.plot: Scientists have discovered that the universe we see is an incidental component of all there is. This program explains how dark matter and dark energy were discovered and how scientists are struggling to understand them.
